Lunarpine stares at the stars above in the moonlit sky. Deep down he 
knows that they're not his. He knows of the emblem on his right 
shoulder but knows not the meaning. As a robot he knows that he does 
not belong on this peaceful plane. As a wolf he yearns for 
companionship, for the hunt. Here he sits, a lone wolf in search of a 
pack. A lost beast willing to sell his spark for some answers.
